answers.answer: Congratulations! :) And all the best for the rest of your pregnancy. Hope all goes well, :)

question: I posted the other day about being so scared for my 20 week scan I was a nervous wreck in Tuesday morning thinking something was going to go wrong,Well I found out were having a boy (first boy out of 5 girls)He is perfect  size!He was sucking his thumb and waving :)Doctors where on about inducing me valentines day due to horrendous previous pregnancy born not breathing rescustated 4 times and in icu for a week born at 36 weeks) now there planning to let me go up to 38 weeks!Next scan is Christmas Eve fingers crossed he's still the right size with me having diabetes type 1Couldn't be any happier with my little man :)
title: Extremely happy
